subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Richards, a former Ranger, scored the game’s only goal as the Blackhawks (43-21-6) avenged a 1-0 Rangers overtime victory in Chicago on March 8.
snippet: Richards, a former Ranger, scored the game’s only goal as the Blackhawks (43-21-6) avenged a 1-0 Rangers overtime victory in Chicago on March 8.
